extendedInfo.description: CuraTel Long Distance -This FREE app works great with your CuraTel Long Distance subscription to make dialing much easier than the conventional way. If you do not have a subscription, you may call 1.866.287.2366. CuraTel Long Distance can save you money when you dial internationally or make long distance calls from your mobile phone using your CuraTel Plan. Good when calling to your family and friends in Mexico, Central, and South America or to any part of the world. Now no need to dial access numbers or PINs,every time while you make an International call. You can directly dial an international number, and route the call through CuraTel Long Distance, giving you world class experience in connectivity & voice clarity.â¢ 3 calling plans to choose from. â¢ Unlimited calls to Mexico cellular availableâ¢ No need to dial access numbers or PINsâ¢ Cut back on your mobile minutesâ¢ Low-cost rates to more than 200 destinationsâ¢ Live customer service 1.866.287.2366

reviews.title: Now, I do not need to dial access numbers or PINs
reviews.comment: This App works just great when I call my family in Guatemala, and some friends in Mexico, and El Salvador from my mobile phone using my Curatel Plan. Now, I do not need to dial access numbers or PINs like \342\200\234The Old way\342\200\235, every time while I make an International call.
reviews.author: Amilcar Gomez
